definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: And do Western welfare states have to be quite so buffet-like?
sentences.chinese: 还有，西方福利社会一定要像个自助餐一样无度吗？

sentences.english: Greece will be back for additional bailouts in short order, since under a bailout it will not fix its underlying problems.
sentences.chinese: 既然金援并不能解决深层问题，希腊将会需索无度。

sentences.english: A spendthrift does not like being a spendthrift.
sentences.chinese: 挥霍无度的人也不喜欢成为败家子。

sentences.english: Despite this, he was so extravagant that he was always in debt.
sentences.chinese: 尽管收入不少，但他挥霍无度，经常债台高筑。

sentences.english: Her spending without restraint ran him heavily in debt.
sentences.chinese: 她的挥霍无度使他负债累累。

sentences.english: Or are they just kneeling at the feet of our wisdom of profligacy?
sentences.chinese: 还是说他们根本就只能匍匐于我们的挥霍无度？

sentences.english: Because people take the excessive use of non-section of deforestation.
sentences.chinese: 因为人们取之无度，用之无节的滥伐树木。

sentences.english: Did your incontinence ruin your body?
sentences.chinese: 是荒淫无度，伤害了自己的身体？

sentences.english: Who is that intemperate and brutal man whom we would redeem?
sentences.chinese: 谁是那我们应该去挽救的纵欲无度的残暴的人？

sentences.english: The giant stars, spendthrifts, were gone long ago, back in the dimmest of the dim far past.
sentences.chinese: 那些挥霍无度的巨星早已消失在了黯淡遥远的过去。

sentences.english: The giant stars, spendthrifts, were gone long ago, back in the dimmest of the dim far past.
sentences.chinese: 那些挥霍无度的巨星早已消失在了遥远的昏暗的过去。

sentences.english: Spendthrifts, however, don't necessarily have the moral high ground.
sentences.chinese: 然而，挥霍无度的人却并不必然能够占据道德制高点。

definition: to indulge in a life of luxury (idiom); extreme extravagance
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
greedy for sex/given to lust for women
